required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: STUDY OF PF-06882961 IN PARTICIPANTS WITH AND WITHOUT VARYING DEGREES OF HEPATIC IMPAIREMENT
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Non-randomized, Open-label, Single-dose, Parallel Cohort Study to Compare the Pharmacokinetics of PF-06882961 in Adult Participants With Varying Degrees of Hepatic Impairment Relative to Participants Without Hepatic Impairment.

brief_summary.textblock: The current study is proposed to evaluate whether there is any clinically meaningful effect of hepatic impairment on the plasma Pharmacokinetic (PK) of PF-06882961

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve from Time Zero to Extrapolated Infinite Time (AUCinf)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, and 14 on Day 1, Hour 24 and 36 on Day 2, Hour 48 on Day 3

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration time AUC[last])
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, and 14 on Day 1, Hour 24 and 36 on Day 2, Hour 48 on Day 3
Hour 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, and 14 on Day 1, Hour 24 and 36 on Day 2, Hour 48 on Day 3

primary_outcome.measure: Fraction of unbound drug in plasma [fu]

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Subjects Reporting Treatment-emergent adverse events (AEs)
Number of Participants With Clinical Laboratory Abnormalities
Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Change From Baseline in Vital Signs
Number of Participants With Abnormal Electrocardiogram (ECG)

arm_group.description: This arm includes participants who will receive an oral dose of PF-06882961 20 milligrams (mg) on Day 1

arm_group.arm_group_label: PF-06882961 participants with mild Hepatic Impairment
arm_group.description: This arm includes participants who will receive an oral dose of PF-06882961 20 mg on Day 1

arm_group.arm_group_label: PF-06882961 participants with moderate Hepatic Impairment
arm_group.description: This arm includes participants who will receive an oral dose of PF-06882961 20 mg on Day 1

arm_group.arm_group_label: PF-06882961 participants with severe Hepatic Impairment
arm_group.description: This arm includes participants who will receive an oral dose of PF-06882961 20 mg on Day 1

intervention.description: PF-06882961 in 20 mg oral tablet will be administered on Day 1
intervention.arm_group_label: PF-06882961 participants with mild Hepatic Impairment
PF-06882961 participants with moderate Hepatic Impairment

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

patient_data.ipd_description: Pfizer will provide access to individual de-identified participant data and related study documents (e.g. protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), Clinical Study Report (CSR)) upon request from qualified researchers, and subject to certain criteria, conditions, and exceptions. Further details on Pfizer's data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.pfizer.com/science/clinical_trials/trial_data_and_results/data_requests.
